title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
body: A rich Italian meat sauce simmered with tomatoes and herbs, served over spaghetti.
instructions: 1. Finely chop onions and garlic. 2. Heat olive oil in a large pan and sauté onions until soft. 3. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. 4. Add ground beef and cook until browned. 5. Add crushed tomatoes and simmer for 30-40 minutes. 6. Cook pasta according to package directions. 7. Serve sauce over pasta with parmesan.

title: Grilled Chicken Breast with Vegetables
body: Juicy grilled chicken breast served with roasted seasonal vegetables.
instructions: 1. Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and olive oil. 2. Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through. 3. Cut broccoli and carrots into bite-sized pieces. 4. Roast vegetables with olive oil at 200°C for 25 minutes. 5. Serve chicken with roasted vegetables.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
body: A nourishing bowl packed with quinoa, roasted vegetables, and chickpeas with a tahini dressing.
instructions: 1. Cook quinoa according to package directions. 2. Roast chickpeas with olive oil and spices at 200°C for 25 minutes. 3. Steam broccoli until tender-crisp. 4. Arrange all ingredients in a bowl. 5. Drizzle with tahini mixed with lemon juice.

title: Greek Salad
body: A refreshing Mediterranean salad with crisp vegetables, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: 1. Cut tomatoes and cucumber into chunks. 2. Slice red onion thinly. 3. Combine vegetables in a large bowl. 4. Add crumbled feta cheese. 5. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. 6. Season with salt and oregano.

title: Salmon with Lemon and Herbs
body: Pan-seared salmon fillets with a bright lemon herb sauce.
instructions: 1. Season salmon fillets with salt and pepper. 2. Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat. 3. Sear salmon skin-side down for 4 minutes. 4. Flip and cook for 3 more minutes. 5. Add lemon juice and butter to the pan. 6. Spoon sauce over salmon and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry with Tofu
body: A quick and healthy Asian-inspired stir fry with crispy tofu and colorful vegetables.
instructions: 1. Press tofu and cut into cubes. 2. Fry tofu until golden and set aside. 3. Stir fry broccoli and carrots. 4. Add garlic. 5. Return tofu to the pan. 6. Season with salt and serve over rice.

title: Banana Oatmeal Breakfast
body: A hearty and nutritious breakfast bowl with oats, banana, and almonds.
instructions: 1. Cook oats with milk according to package directions. 2. Slice banana. 3. Top oatmeal with banana slices. 4. Sprinkle with almonds for crunch.

title: Beef Steak with Roasted Potatoes
body: Perfectly seared beef steak served with crispy roasted potatoes and garlic butter.
instructions: 1. Season steak with salt and pepper. 2. Sear in a hot pan for 3-4 minutes per side. 3. Rest for 5 minutes. 4. Cut potatoes into wedges. 5. Toss with olive oil and roast at 200°C for 35 minutes. 6. Serve steak with potatoes and garlic butter.

title: Spinach and Egg Breakfast
body: A protein-packed breakfast with sautéed spinach and perfectly cooked eggs.
instructions: 1. Heat butter in a pan. 2. Add spinach and sauté until wilted. 3. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Push spinach to the side. 5. Crack eggs into the pan. 6. Cook eggs to your preference. 7. Serve together with toast.

title: Lentil Soup
body: A hearty and warming lentil soup packed with vegetables and aromatic spices.
instructions: 1. Sauté onions and carrots in olive oil. 2. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. 3. Add lentils and vegetable broth. 4. Simmer for 25-30 minutes until lentils are tender. 5. Season with salt, pepper, and cumin. 6. Serve with crusty bread.

title: Avocado Toast with Egg
body: Creamy avocado spread on toasted bread topped with a perfectly poached egg.
instructions: 1. Toast bread until golden. 2. Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt. 3. Spread avocado on toast. 4. Poach or fry an egg. 5. Place egg on top of avocado. 6. Season with pepper.

title: Shrimp Stir Fry
body: Quick and flavorful shrimp stir fry with vegetables.
instructions: 1. Season shrimp with salt and pepper. 2. Stir fry shrimp until pink and set aside. 3. Sauté broccoli and bell peppers. 4. Add garlic. 5. Return shrimp to the pan. 6. Season and serve over rice.

title: Lamb Chops with Herbs
body: Tender lamb chops seasoned with rosemary and garlic, pan-seared to perfection.
instructions: 1. Season lamb chops with salt, pepper, and rosemary. 2. Heat olive oil in a pan. 3. Sear lamb chops for 3-4 minutes per side. 4. Add garlic and butter to the pan. 5. Baste lamb with the butter. 6. Rest for 5 minutes before serving.

title: Mango Smoothie Bowl
body: A tropical smoothie bowl topped with fresh fruits and granola.
instructions: 1. Blend frozen mango with yogurt until smooth. 2. Pour into a bowl. 3. Top with sliced banana. 4. Add granola for crunch.

title: Caprese Salad
body: A classic Italian salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: 1. Slice tomatoes and mozzarella into rounds. 2. Arrange alternating slices on a plate. 3. Drizzle generously with olive oil. 4. Season with salt and pepper.

title: Tuna Salad Sandwich
body: A classic tuna salad sandwich with celery and mayonnaise on whole wheat bread.
instructions: 1. Drain canned tuna. 2. Mix tuna with mayonnaise. 3. Add diced celery. 4. Season with salt and pepper. 5. Spread on whole wheat bread. 6. Add lettuce and serve.

title: Pumpkin Soup
body: A creamy and comforting pumpkin soup perfect for autumn evenings.
instructions: 1. Sauté onions in olive oil until soft. 2. Add pumpkin cubes and vegetable broth. 3. Simmer until pumpkin is tender. 4. Blend until smooth. 5. Season with salt, pepper, and nutmeg.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
body: Crisp romaine lettuce with grilled chicken and parmesan.
instructions: 1. Grill chicken breast and slice. 2. Chop romaine lettuce. 3. Toss lettuce with olive oil and lemon. 4. Top with sliced chicken. 5. Add shaved parmesan.

title: Blueberry Pancakes
body: Fluffy pancakes studded with fresh blueberries.
instructions: 1. Mix flour, milk, egg, and a pinch of salt. 2. Fold in blueberries. 3. Heat butter in a pan. 4. Pour batter to form pancakes. 5. Cook until bubbles form, then flip. 6. Serve with maple syrup.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
body: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with a savory mixture of rice and beef.
instructions: 1. Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds. 2. Cook rice according to package. 3. Brown ground beef with onions. 4. Mix beef with rice and tomatoes. 5. Stuff peppers with mixture. 6. Bake at 180°C for 35 minutes.

title: Honey Glazed Carrots
body: Sweet and tender carrots glazed with butter, a perfect side dish.
instructions: 1. Peel and slice carrots. 2. Boil carrots until tender. 3. Drain and return to pot. 4. Add butter. 5. Toss until carrots are coated. 6. Season with salt and serve.

title: Mushroom Risotto
body: Creamy Italian risotto with sautéed mushrooms and parmesan cheese.
instructions: 1. Sauté mushrooms in butter and set aside. 2. Sauté onions in olive oil. 3. Add rice and toast for 2 minutes. 4. Add broth gradually, stirring constantly. 5. Stir in mushrooms and parmesan. 6. Season and serve immediately.

title: Baked Salmon with Asparagus
body: Oven-baked salmon fillets with tender asparagus spears.
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 200°C. 2. Place salmon and asparagus on a baking sheet. 3. Drizzle with olive oil. 4. Season with salt, pepper, and lemon. 5. Bake for 15-18 minutes. 6. Serve immediately.

title: Black Bean Tacos
body: Flavorful vegetarian tacos filled with seasoned black beans and fresh toppings.
instructions: 1. Heat black beans with cumin and chili powder. 2. Warm tortillas. 3. Fill tortillas with beans. 4. Top with diced tomatoes and onions. 5. Add avocado slices. 6. Squeeze lime juice on top.

title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
body: A creamy and protein-rich smoothie with peanut butter and banana.
instructions: 1. Add banana to blender. 2. Add peanut butter and milk. 3. Blend until smooth. 4. Add ice if desired. 5. Pour into glass and serve.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
body: Breaded eggplant slices baked with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.
instructions: 1. Slice eggplant and salt to remove moisture. 2. Bread eggplant slices with egg. 3. Bake at 200°C until golden. 4. Layer with tomato sauce and mozzarella. 5. Bake until cheese melts. 6. Top with parmesan.

title: Grilled Zucchini Salad
body: Charred zucchini slices with feta cheese and a lemon dressing.
instructions: 1. Slice zucchini lengthwise. 2. Brush with olive oil. 3. Grill until charred. 4. Arrange on a plate. 5. Top with crumbled cheese. 6. Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil.

title: Turkey Meatballs
body: Lean turkey meatballs baked to perfection, great with pasta or as an appetizer.
instructions: 1. Mix ground turkey with egg. 2. Add minced garlic and onion. 3. Season with salt and pepper. 4. Form into meatballs. 5. Bake at 200°C for 20 minutes. 6. Serve with marinara sauce.

title: Coconut Curry Vegetables
body: A fragrant Thai-inspired curry with mixed vegetables.
instructions: 1. Sauté onions and garlic. 2. Add curry paste and cook for 1 minute. 3. Add broccoli and bell peppers. 4. Simmer until vegetables are tender. 5. Serve over rice.

title: Bison Burger
body: A lean and flavorful bison burger served on a toasted bun with fresh toppings.
instructions: 1. Form bison meat into patties. 2. Season with salt and pepper. 3. Grill for 4-5 minutes per side. 4. Toast burger buns. 5. Assemble with lettuce, tomato, and onion.

title: Scallops with Garlic Butter
body: Pan-seared scallops in a rich garlic butter sauce.
instructions: 1. Pat scallops dry and season. 2. Sear in hot pan for 2 minutes per side. 3. Remove scallops. 4. Add butter and garlic to pan. 5. Return scallops and baste with butter. 6. Finish with lemon juice.

title: Kale and Quinoa Salad
body: A nutritious salad with massaged kale, quinoa, and a tangy lemon dressing.
instructions: 1. Cook quinoa and let cool. 2. Massage kale with olive oil and salt. 3. Combine kale and quinoa. 4. Add diced cucumber. 5. Dress with lemon juice and olive oil. 6. Top with pumpkin seeds.

title: Ham and Cheese Omelette
body: A classic breakfast omelette filled with ham and melted cheese.
instructions: 1. Whisk eggs with salt and pepper. 2. Heat butter in a pan. 3. Pour in eggs and cook until set. 4. Add diced ham and cheese to one half. 5. Fold omelette over. 6. Serve immediately.

title: Tilapia with Lemon Butter
body: Light and flaky tilapia fillets pan-fried with a simple lemon butter sauce.
instructions: 1. Season tilapia with salt and pepper. 2. Heat olive oil in a pan. 3. Cook tilapia for 3-4 minutes per side. 4. Add butter and lemon juice. 5. Spoon sauce over fish. 6. Garnish with parsley.

title: Ricotta Toast with Berries
body: Creamy ricotta spread on toast topped with fresh berries.
instructions: 1. Toast bread until golden. 2. Spread ricotta cheese on toast. 3. Top with fresh blueberries and strawberries. 4. Drizzle with honey if desired.

title: Edamame Salad
body: A refreshing Asian-inspired salad with edamame, cucumber, and sesame.
instructions: 1. Cook edamame and let cool. 2. Dice cucumber. 3. Combine edamame and cucumber. 4. Add sesame seeds. 5. Dress with olive oil. 6. Season with salt.

title: Pork Chops with Apple
body: Juicy pork chops pan-fried and served with caramelized apples.
instructions: 1. Season pork chops with salt and pepper. 2. Sear in a hot pan for 4-5 minutes per side. 3. Remove and rest. 4. Slice apples and sauté in butter. 5. Serve pork with apples.

title: Goat Cheese Salad
body: Mixed greens topped with creamy goat cheese, walnuts, and balsamic dressing.
instructions: 1. Arrange mixed greens on plates. 2. Crumble goat cheese on top. 3. Add toasted walnuts. 4. Slice pears and add to salad. 5. Drizzle with olive oil.
